name: The No-Maddz
description: '''The No-Maddz''' is a Jamaican art collective and roots reggae dub poetry band consisting of Sheldon "Sheppie" Shepherd and Everaldo "Evie" Creary. Both are recipients of the prestigious Jamaican Prime Minister's Youth Award for Excellence in Arts and Culture. Their sound is a fusion of a unique dub poetry style with multiple music genres and it carries the spirit of Jamaica's roots music.
